faq.question: What are the working hours?
faq.answer: Working hours are 24 hours a day, you can place your order at any time throughout the week

faq.question: What are the areas where delivery service is available within Egypt?
faq.answer: Currently, delivery is available in Cairo and Giza, and we are working on expanding to other governorates soon

faq.question: What is the minimum order value?
How long does the delivery process take?
faq.answer: Delivery usually takes between 3 to 7 working days, depending on the location and region.

faq.question: Can I change my delivery address after placing the order?
faq.answer: Yes, you can change the delivery address if the order hasn't been shipped yet. Please contact customer service as soon as possible to update the address.

faq.question: What should I do if the product is damaged upon delivery?
faq.answer: If you receive a damaged product, please contact customer service within 48 hours of receiving it. We will arrange for a replacement or refund according to our return policy.

faq.question: What is the return policy?
faq.answer: You can return products within 14 days of receiving them, as long as they are unused and in their original condition. Some products may be exempt from the return policy (e.g., perishable or opened items).

faq.question: How can I return my product?
faq.answer: Please contact customer service for instructions on how to return the product. You may need to fill out a return form and ship the product using an approved shipping service.

faq.question: When will I receive my refund?
faq.answer: Once the return request is approved, the refund will be processed within 7 to 10 working days and will be returned to the payment method you used at checkout.

faq.question: What payment methods are available?
faq.answer:
We accept various payment methods, including:
- Cash on Delivery
- Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard)
- PayPal
- Apple Pay
- KNET (if available in your country)
